block.p: ROCKLAND COUNTY 10 p.m. tomorrow to 5 a.m. Wednesday, and 10 p.m. Thursday to 5 a.m. Friday (ground spraying) entire Town of Clarkstown, including the village of Upper Nyack and portions of the villages of Nyack and Spring Valley.

WESTCHESTER COUNTY 11:30 p.m. tomorrow to 4:30 a.m. Wednesday (ground spraying) Briarcliff Manor, Dobbs Ferry, Hastings, Town and Village of Ossining, and parts of southern White Plains not sprayed last Wednesday.

ROCKLAND COUNTY 10 p.m. tomorrow to 5 a.m. Wednesday, and 10 p.m. Thursday to 5 a.m. Friday (ground spraying) entire Town of Clarkstown, including the village of Upper Nyack and portions of the villages of Nyack and Spring Valley.

WESTCHESTER COUNTY 11:30 p.m. tomorrow to 4:30 a.m. Wednesday (ground spraying) Briarcliff Manor, Dobbs Ferry, Hastings, Town and Village of Ossining, and parts of southern White Plains not sprayed last Wednesday.
SUFFOLK COUNTY 5 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. today (ground spraying) Bellport (beach area) and Water Island, on Fire Island.
Note: Spraying schedules are subject to change in the event of rain.
